transcripts.speaker: Speaker 1
transcripts.text: Working. Kind of like a call center job, but.

transcripts.speaker: Speaker 1
transcripts.text: Every day they gave us these scripts and we had to call companies who maybe this company bought a printer within the last couple months.

transcripts.speaker: Speaker 1
transcripts.text: Yeah. And I called the company and said, oh, I saw that you recently bought the HP inkjet printer, and we have an upcoming training session on this day. Would you like to attend the training session about this printer?

transcripts.speaker: Speaker 2
transcripts.text: And have a really good call.

transcripts.speaker: Speaker 1
transcripts.text: And I called so many companies again and again talking with the secretaries, talking with other people, just saying, do you want to go to this seminar about some electronic device that they had recently bought?

transcripts.speaker: Speaker 2
transcripts.text: If you called me, I'd be like, yeah, I do. Can I buy more?
